original_title: Hank Danger and the Fountain of Death
overview: Intrepid adventurer Hank Danger races to discover the location of the legendary Fountain of Death! Along the way he battles a sly traitor, a seductive vampire jungle queen, a tribe of jungle warrior women, and an assortment of ferocious monsters!
tagline: It's time for danger... Hank Danger!
title: Hank Danger and the Fountain of Death
